General.Name: Sky Energy Indonesia Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Sky Energy Indonesia Tbk manufactures and sells solar modules for homes, and commercial and government sectors worldwide. The company offers polycrystalline, monocrystalline, and flexible solar panels, as well as portable solar kits; light-emitting diode bulbs, lamps, and lights; solar mounting systems; system solutions; solar inverters and monitoring solutions; and energy storage solutions. It is also involved in design, installation, and maintenance of solar power plants. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Bogor, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jalan Raya Cicadas No. 258, Bogor, Indonesia, 16964
